description: Why waste yer stinking time diggin inthe junk when you can just buy the best?! Because it's funy to dig in the junk that's why!
tooltip: Why waste yer stinking time diggin inthe junk when you can just buy the best?! Because it's funy to dig in the junk that's why! (Bugblins can now purchase improved weapons instead of Scavenging for them)
